definition: wind and frost/fig. hardships
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
weather-beaten/having experienced the hardships of life

sentences.english: Her weather-beaten face tells of a hard life.
sentences.chinese: 她飽經風霜的臉說明艱苦的生活。

sentences.english: That good steel must be thoroughly tempered what strength can be more weather-beaten.
sentences.chinese: 千錘百煉才能夠磨鍊出好鋼，飽經風霜才能更強。

sentences.english: Where doesnt have wind and frost rain bloods test to have clank the lofty character?
sentences.chinese: 沒有風霜雨血的考驗哪有錚錚的傲骨？

sentences.english: Photography, the hard part is to adhere to in the weathered rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 攝影，難的是在風霜雨雪中的堅持。

sentences.english: Frost and rain, give evening early to return.
The garden, FuCan help the weak, weathered rain and snow, a new core flared.
sentences.chinese: 花園裏，扶殘助弱，風霜雨雪，育出新蕊亭亭。

sentences.english: This situation is difficult to stay, fiber film away, melancholy drift to send season's wind and frost.
sentences.chinese: 此情難留，纖影遠去，惆悵飄送一季的風霜。

sentences.english: The seeming punishment of winter is providing, in reality, invaluable aid.
sentences.chinese: 風霜雪凍看似上蒼的懲罰，而實際卻爲生命注入洪福。

sentences.english: Despite the hard winter, the rose is still alive.
sentences.chinese: 儘管冬天嚴寒，玫瑰叢仍然傲立風霜。

sentences.english: Wind frost rain snow Hypnotized flowers.
I know you have come to the cold, frost.
sentences.chinese: 我知道寒流來到，你遭遇風霜。

sentences.english: The man has the kind of face that had seen too much, a face much older than it ought to be.
sentences.chinese: 這個人的臉飽經風霜，比他實際年齡看上去老得多。

sentences.english: Sometimes, you really wanted to change into a large tree that sheltered her from those troubles in her life.
sentences.chinese: 有時，你真想做一棵大樹，爲她遮擋人生的風霜雨雪。

sentences.english: The house was exposed to the elements on al sides.
sentences.chinese: 這所小屋四面都受到風霜雨雪的侵襲。

sentences.english: But is profaned, if not lives in disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 不受羞辱也經褻瀆風霜。
